There is no nearby gardener that will watch over your growing belladonna plant, however, a Tool leprechaun can be found next to the patch. It will take 5 hours and 20 minutes to grow. Belladonna yields cave nightshade when harvested.

Belladonna is a Farming plant grown at level 63 Farming. Belladonna is grown by planting 1 belladonna seed in the belladonna patch on the west side of Draynor Manor using a seed dibber. There is no nearby gardener that will watch over your growing belladonna plant, however, a Tool leprechaun can be found next to the patch. It will take 5 hours and 20 minutes to grow. Belladonna yields cave nightshade when harvested.

Planting the belladonna seed gives 91 farming experience. If the player does not watch the farming patch, then disease in the allotment may be removed using Plant cure, or using the Cure plant spell in the Lunar spellbook with level 66 Magic and completion of Lunar Diplomacy (albeit more expensive, this can save inventory space when doing farm runs). However, if left alone, the diseased allotment will die.

The minimum yield is always three, but a higher Farming level increases the potential yield, similar to limpwurt roots. If the player's inventory becomes full from harvesting, excess cave nightshade will be dropped on the ground. Tool leprechauns will not be able to exchange the produce for banknotes, as cave nightshade is untradeable.

Harvesting cave nightshade is one step in the hard Lumbridge & Draynor Diary.

Farmers must pick nightshade with gloves equipped, or they will be hit for 2 poison damage instead of harvesting the nightshade. The following gloves can be used to pick belladonna:

  • 3rd age vambraces
  • Adamant gloves
  • Ancient bracers
  • Armadyl bracers
  • Bandos bracers
  • Barrows gloves
  • Black d'hide vambraces

'''Belladonna''' is a [[Farming]] plant grown at level 63 Farming. Belladonna is grown by planting 1 [[belladonna seed]] in the [[belladonna patch]] on the west side of [[Draynor Manor]] using a [[seed dibber]]. There is no nearby gardener that will watch over your growing belladonna plant, however, a [[Tool leprechaun]] can be found next to the patch. It will take 5 hours and 20 minutes to grow. Belladonna yields [[cave nightshade]] when harvested.

Planting the belladonna seed gives 91 farming experience. If the player does not watch the farming patch, then disease in the allotment may be removed using [[Plant cure]], or using the [[Cure plant]] spell in the [[Lunar]] spellbook with level 66 Magic and completion of [[Lunar Diplomacy]] (albeit more expensive, this can save inventory space when doing farm runs). However, if left alone, the diseased allotment will die.

The minimum yield is always three, but a higher Farming level increases the potential yield, similar to [[limpwurt root]]s. If the player's inventory becomes full from harvesting, excess [[cave nightshade]] '''will''' be dropped on the ground. Tool leprechauns will not be able to exchange the produce for [[Bank note|banknotes]], as [[cave nightshade]] is untradeable.

Harvesting [[cave nightshade]] is one step in the hard [[Lumbridge & Draynor Diary]].

Farmers must pick nightshade with [[gloves]] equipped, or they will be hit for 2 poison damage instead of harvesting the nightshade. The following gloves can be used to pick belladonna:
